hero.title: Chandrayaan Mission Tools
hero.subtitle: Interactive visualization and mission design tools for lunar orbital mechanics

apps.title: Chandrayaan Mission Designer
apps.description: Step-by-step mission design wizard using backwards planning methodology. Start from your landing site, find optimal lighting windows, and calculate required orbital parameters for mission success.

apps.title: Explorer
apps.description: Interactive 3D visualization of lunar and spacecraft orbits. Explore orbital mechanics with real-time adjustments to RAAN, inclination, and more.

apps.title: Legacy Designer
apps.description: A simple lunar direct transfer orbit design tool. Plan LOI and TLI event based real ephemeris data. Plan first and playback later.

footer.text: Educational tools for understanding Chandrayaan-3 orbital mechanics
